column1: From a technical point of view this is mainly nip and tuck stuff, but Microsoft is betting that the innovative use of existing technology will be a winner and is finally cashing in on all the application programming interfaces, dynamic data exchange, object linking and embedding facilities that it has been burying in its applications and operating systems for the last couple of years.

column1: It was nip and tuck up to 7 - 7 before Best opened up a 12 - 9 lead.
